content: Greetings to all the Crypto Casino enthusiasts here at [Suspicious link removed] has set its launching date to be the 20th of December 2022. And we are looking forward to that with great enthusiasm. Some number of users have been onboarded already and we are inviting you to join these growing number of Crypto Casino enthusiast who are making Fortune.st their preferred Casino platform. After countless hours of tweaking and testing, we believe we now have a system that works and a platform that is pleasing to the eyes.While 20th December is the official launching date, active gamers are already utilizing the site, playing games and making deposits and withdrawals. You too can try it out now and give us your feedback. Our aim is to become one of the most exciting gaming destination in the coming months and years, we wont rest until we get there and we are inviting you to join us in this journey.Win $100,000 Jackpot In order to win, you are required to land up one or combination of matching numbers across one of the paylines on the reels. How much the payout will be, depends on the number of identical numbers that have lined up on the reels. The ultimate prize comes from lining up all 3 identical numbers.Win the Jackpot of $100,000 by Lining up all 3 Identical Numbers1. Signup at https://fortune.st/2. Enter the amount you want to wager.3. Enter your lucky number.Once you have gone through the aforementioned steps, you simply need to hit the Play Now button to set the reels in motion and wait for the outcome of the spin. On that note, it is important to remember that all spins should be treated individually since the outcome is determined by special programs, called Random Number Generators. Thus, the outcome is always governed by a random principle and is never affected by what has happened on preceding spins. This is one of our most exciting games and we want you to try it out.NO KYC, Fully AnonymousWe had the option to operate from any given jurisdiction and remove the "No KYC Policy" or to operate outside any jurisdiction and keep the No KYC Policy of which we choose the later. Our aim is to be fairness and integrity driven, as well as robust customer care experiences.One of the most notable Crypto Casino that offers full NO KYC services is LTC Casino and we are looking forward to joining them in that niche. Every other casinos requires KYC and you can't remove it and still keep your license. Since we are not the type of Casinos that hide behind lengthy and bogus Terms and Conditions, we decided to go it the gray and hard way by staying out of any particular jurisdiction while maintaining truthfulness to our customers.We have invested a good amount of time tweaking and testing our platform and games, and now we are ready to launch officially on the 20th of December, 2022. comments.author: LoyceV
comments.created_time: December 12, 2022, 05:45:21 PMLast edit: December 13, 2022, 12:08:53 PM by LoyceV
comments.body: Please leave me out of this topic. Your site isn't even provably fair, which means the player can't prove it if the casino cheats.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Quote from: Fortune.st on December 12, 2022, 04:09:06 PMOne of the most notable Crypto Casino that offers full NO KYC services is LTC Casino and we are looking forward to joining them in that niche.Okay so you're got inspired from LTC casino that doesn't ask KYC? they had an accusation where the gambler can't withdraw the funds from LTC casino since the gambler is really lucky, but in the end they're asking KYC to prove if the gambler is cheating. Which mean they're not 100% anonymous and would still require KYC when there's a lucky gambler beat the house.Quote from: LTC Casino on March 15, 2022, 02:35:36 PMWe allow VPN, multiple accounts and we will never ask for KYC. In this case multiple accounting is just an additional prove of possible cheating - OP played ONLY ONE slot for 16+ hours in a row and used several accounts playing same slot.If you're want to convince anyone you have a good budget since you want to run a campaign, it doesn't help you to built up your reputation and I guess people should be careful, maybe this is a sister company from LTC casino.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk. I hope you can enjoy your staying at this forum and have the opportunity to grow your business.We will wait for a while until your site is officially launched.But when I visited your site and checked the registration, I wondered how come you added a Country and Mobile Phone to the registration page, which is a "must fill" rather than an "option" to filled because adding a Mobile Phone is a basic verification for some people and some of them does not like to give their mobile phone. The other casinos do not ask for mobile phones but only email and password, which is a common thing that the casino asks their new user who wants to register on their site. Maybe you can remove the "Country" and the "Mobile Phone" column from the registration page.

And we are looking forward to be part of this community for years to come.First, we are not in anyway affiliated to LTC Casino even though we admire their business model and hope to build our system base on the model of 100% No KYC while offering robust gaming experience to our customers. We don't know what happens in other companies but the case you sited seems like a typical case of malpractices which could trigger any casino company to take actions. Money laundering is a serious matter and we too do not tolerate it on our platform. Yes, we are preparing a serious budget to begin our campaign and we have slated to managers and partners to work with. If you think there is anything you can do with us, feel free to get in touch with me via DM or email to help@fortune.st.Quote from: LoyceV on December 12, 2022, 05:45:21 PMPlease leave me out of this topic. Your site isn't even probably fair, which means the player can't prove it if the casino cheats.This table was sent us as a recommendation in our previous post, so I decided to add it in this post as a head up to the mentioned managers. We do not know you personally. We are fair and our business model is governed by integrity. We hope you'll get to believe in us as time goes on. Kindly give us the chance to win your trust.Quote from: ethereumhunter on December 13, 2022, 07:28:54 AMWelcome to Bitcointalk. I hope you can enjoy your staying at this forum and have the opportunity to grow your business.We will wait for a while until your site is officially launched.But when I visited your site and checked the registration, I wondered how come you added a Country and Mobile Phone to the registration page, which is a "must fill" rather than an "option" to filled because adding a Mobile Phone is a basic verification for some people and some of them does not like to give their mobile phone. The other casinos do not ask for mobile phones but only email and password, which is a common thing that the casino asks their new user who wants to register on their site. Maybe you can remove the "Country" and the "Mobile Phone" column from the registration page.Thank you ethereumhunter for welcoming us here Â  and we are looking forward to growing and becoming better in what we do. About the country and mobile number on the registration form, you can fill in anything you like. We do not verify those information because they are personally identifiable information. In future we may consider removing it all together. But for now, you can fill in anything you like and be fine with the registration as the system do not ask for mobile verification.The site is already active and we are taking in new users. Feel free to create an account, make deposit, and start playing to win. You can win and cashout even now.

Our goal is to be one of the best in the industry and we are preparing ground to be just that. We are new but we are here to stay and would appreciate your support, suggestions, and patronages. Thank you.

comments.author: Fortune.st
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on December 14, 2022, 08:27:23 AMQuote from: Fortune.st on December 14, 2022, 07:43:53 AMQuote from: SFR10 on December 13, 2022, 05:42:44 PMWhile you're at it, you might want to consider removing all of the fake removes reviews (feel free to prove me wrong) as well!I am having a hard time trying to understand your second statement.I think I fixed the typo. I noticed the fake reviews and fake bets too.Now I get it, and thank you for the translations. Like we have stated time and again, we are preparing for launching and most of the activities going on at the site now are testing activities. If you have paid attention close enough, you'd discover that the name of the winner is "Fortune Freak" which is to indicate it's from the Fortune.st testing account. And the transaction name is also "Test Lion" indicating it's from test accounts too. As live transactions data begins to come in, they will gradually replace the test data. I don't think there is anything wrong in stating that our mission and goal is to become one of the best in the industry. Criticism is good but being reasonable is also important.

Instead, the Fortune.st games uses a random number generation (RNG) equation to calculate the outcome.Random number generationÂ (RNG) equations use values of entropy (chaos) like the micro movements of your mouse to generate a random string of numbers. Our current Returns to Players has one of the highest percentage in the industry. You just need to try it out to see the winning rate yourselves.

comments.body: -Â  When I checked your website platform, OP seems disappointed with its appearance, or maybe it's just my feeling. As far as I can see, the catch of your casino is for more affiliate programs. Because of course, if you only gamble a little, you will use the referral commission you have.Then I just noticed that to avail of the 50% referral commission, it needs to be at level 4, meaning it needs to be worked hard. The personal if you know is my end level with 40%, and the direction of my 2nd level will be the 3rd level because I have 45$, and the direct referral of the 3rd level will be the 4th level that I can only avail here by 50%, right? I think you should change it just in my opinion and opinion.

comments.author: Fortune.st
comments.body: Thank you all for your invaluable contribution to this thread. We are giving out free credit to test the games and platform.Anyone who wish to test the games should send me a DM or email me via the email address on the original post. Just sign up to the site and message me to request for free credit. Thank you and continue to have a wonderful week.
